name: Phase (NegaBlitz)
description:
The newest version of the game I've been working on for a while now. It contains the first full level, and has a mini-boss. Later versions will contain a bit more, and I'll update this page with more as time goes on.

Take control of Blitz or Val through the first level of the game and try to get to the end. Blitz is partnered with a sealed goddess, Elzik, while Val has her own agenda. The story's not going to be the central focus of the game, but it'll develop along as the game progresses.

There's 20 chips to collect throughout the screens, with 1 on each. There's also 2 secret chips that can be obtained through secret, harder screens accessible through hidden exits.

Expect bugs, it's pretty early on.

Controls for keyboard:
- Arrow keys to move
- Spacebar to jump
- V to teleport

Gamepad is also supported:
- Joystick or D-pad to move
- A to jump
- X, Y, or Right Trigger

Special thanks to my good friend, Joe T, for helping with the music throughout all this time.
